long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a fan-made extension to automatically download your Colonist.io games after completion. The games are stored in a simple JSON format that can then be uploaded to https://lemeryfertitta.github.io/ColonyHistorian/ for review or parsed and analyzed with other tools.

The source code is available at https://github.com/lemeryfertitta/ColonyHistorian, which can also be used to report bugs or contribute to the project.
